title: Sensex falls over 750 pts, Nifty slips to 16,100; Tech Mahindra, TCS top losers - Jagran English
content: Sensex falls over 750 pts, Nifty slips to 16,100; Tech Mahindra, TCS top losers  Jagran English
description: Stock Market May 9 Updates  Only two stocks   Power Grid and Titan   started the session in green at the BSE  Meanwhile  Tech Mahindra was the top loser  shedding by 3 55 per cent
